content:
{"name": "Trinity Human Services Corporation", "alternate_name": "", "description": "https://www.trinityhumanservices.org/programs/emergency-food-pantry

Our Client Choice Food Pantry is a modern, supermarket-style pantry where customers can shop for and choose the food they want. They can also reserve a time to visit the Food Pantry by using the mobile app Plentiful that allows customers to make appointments to shop. From July-October, our Food Pantry features fresh organic fruits and vegetables grown at local farms through United Way’s Local Produce Link program.


Our goal is to eliminate food insecurity by connecting clients to food and to resources and education they need to help lift them and their families out of crisis.


We are seeking volunteers  to help at the pantry. THSC Food Pantry is the only emergency food program in the area that is open four days a week, Tuesday – Friday, 9 am – 12 pm and 1– 4 pm.


How to make an appointment: 

A) Text "TRINITYHSC" to PANTRY (726-879) to make a reservation.

B) Apply online at http://www.plentifulapp.com

C) Call us at (718) 388-3176

D) Register on site in person with photo ID", "email": "", "url": "www.trinityhumanservices.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "153 Johnson Ave", "address_2": "", "city": "Brooklyn", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.706409, "longitude": -73.944786}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 388-3176", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
